lead_paragraph: The Detroit teachers’ union filed a lawsuit Thursday against the district calling for repairing “deplorable” conditions and removing the state-appointed emergency manager, Darnell Earley.
snippet: The Detroit teachers’ union filed a lawsuit Thursday against the district calling for repairing “deplorable” conditions and removing the state-appointed emergency manager, Darnell Earley.

headline.main: Michigan: Detroit Teachers Seek End to Control by Emergency Manager
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit Teachers Seek End To Control By Emergency Manager
